C_STDEQ.name: Standard Equipment
C_STDEQ.disclaimer:
Standard for P100D

  • Choice of Premium Interior with any décor
  • Prevent viruses and bacteria from entering the cabin with a medical-grade HEPA air filtration system
  • Bioweapon Defense Mode blocks offensive odors, nitrogen oxides and hydrocarbon exhaust fumes from polluting cabin air with two activated carbon purification filters
  • Self-presenting front door opens as you approach and closes when you press the brake pedal
  • Premium Audio Upgrade standard with custom audio specifically tuned for a Tesla’s ultra-quiet cabin
  • XM satellite radio
  • Sub-Zero Weather Package included as standard featuring heated seats for every passenger, heated steering wheel, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters
  • Phone dock included and installed

Safety

  • Active safety technologies, including collision avoidance and automatic emergency braking
  • Power-folding, auto-dimming and heated side mirrors
  • Three-position dynamic LED turning lights for nighttime visibility
  • LED fog lights
  • Up to four LATCH child seat attachments

Warranty

  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • 4 year, 50,000 mile limited warranty

Convenience

  • Smart air suspension with GPS memory for automatically raising and lowering ride height
  • Largest glass panoramic windshield in production, providing unparalleled views
  • Falcon Wing doors allow easy access to second and third row seats, even from tight parking spaces
  • 88 cubic feet of storage in the five seat configuration
  • Front trunk with storage for luggage
  • Power liftgate
  • Keyless entry
  • Ambient interior lighting
  • 2” receiver for hitch-mounted bike and ski carriers, also capable of towing 5,000 pounds on 20” wheels or 3,500 pounds on 22” wheels
  • Towing Package included standard with software that actively monitors trailer sway and adjusts wheel braking as needed
  • Heated front seats

Technology

  • Over-the-air software updates add features and enhance performance
  • Maps and navigation with real time traffic information
  • 400 kWh of free annual Supercharger credits
  • GPS-enabled Homelink for opening and closing garage doors
  • Center console with removable dividers

C_CHG_SUPER.name: Charging
C_CHG_SUPER.description:
Model X comes with the necessary equipment to charge at home or on the road.
  • Onboard charger
  • 240-volt adapter
  • Mobile connector
  • J1772 public charging station adapter
  • Standard household outlet adapter

C_PERF.name: Model X Performance Upgrades
C_PERF.disclaimer:
PerformancePerformance acceleration ratings are based on maximum battery power mode and follow Motor Trend's test procedure of subtracting the first foot rollout time to represent drag strip performance.RangeFigures based on testing to EPA standard. Vehicle range may vary depending on the vehicle configuration, battery age and condition, driving style and operating, environmental and climate conditions.

For additional information, please see the current version of the Owner’s Manual. The Owner’s Manual may be updated and revised as new features are introduced. Please refer to your vehicle’s Owner’s Manual for the most up to date information.

C_CHG_INSTALL.name: Home Charging Installation
C_CHG_INSTALL.disclaimer: Home Charging InstallationAt this time, we can offer home charging installations in Massachusetts and Nevada only. Charging installations are invoiced separately from the price of your vehicle and payment is due upon completion of installation.

C_WT.name: Wheels
C_WT.disclaimer: WheelsThere are different advantages to the 22-inch and 20-inch wheels. For example, the 22-inch wheels generally provide increased handling whereas the 20-inch wheels wear less quickly and provide more protection from obstacles and poor road conditions.

name: US 2017 AUGUST V3

HC01.description: Tesla will install a 240 volt outlet near your parking spot, providing up to 25 miles of range per hour of charge. Most installations cost $1,000. If your home requires electrical upgrades or other trade work to accommodate charging, additional charges may apply. You may also upgrade to a Wall Connector for a higher rate of charge.
HC01.name: Home Charging Installation
HC01.disclaimer: Payment due upon completion of installation

AU01.description:
Wrap your cabin in a pristine and powerful soundstage. This upgrade includes a larger amplifier, a subwoofer, and 16 precisely positioned speakers to faithfully reproduce sound and deliver it directly to your ears and those of your passengers. This is a custom-designed audiophile-quality system that takes best advantage of the spacious interior and ultra-quiet motors of Model X. The result is a listening experience that is unique in the automotive world, besting much more expensive systems in head-to-head comparisons.

  • XM Satellite radio capability
  • 17 speakers with neodymium magnets
  • High bitrate streaming capability
AU01.name: Premium Sound

TW01.description:
Equip your Model X with a high strength steel tow bar and removable 2" hitch receiver, capable of towing up to 5,000 pounds on 20" wheels or 3,500 pounds on 22" wheels. Software actively monitors trailers sway and adjusts wheel braking as needed.

  • Removable 2" hitch receiver
  • 7 pin trailer electronics harness
  • Tow mode software package
  • Compatible with hitch mounted bike and ski carriers
TW01.name: Towing Package

BP01.description: Take the quickest production SUV in the world and make it even faster. The Ludicrous Speed upgrade adds high-capacity electronics to unlock more power and acceleration, enabling your Model X to go from 0-60 mph in 3.2 seconds and deliver a quarter mile time of 11.7 seconds.
BP01.name: Ludicrous Speed Upgrade

BC0R.description: Exclusive Tesla Red four piston Brembo brake calipers are available only on Tesla Performance vehicles.
BC0R.name: Tesla Red Brake Calipers

SU01.description: Experience superior handling, efficiency, and ride comfort. Adjust the height of your Model X. Smart Air Suspension also utilizes the GPS of your car to recognize the location of past adjustments to suspension height and automatically updates when you revisit specific locations, such as a steep driveway.
SU01.name: Smart Air Suspension

DV4W.override_description:
• The Model X 100D provides great value, combining the longest range available with the instant acceleration of Tesla’s electric all-wheel drive.
  • 100 kWh Battery with All-Wheel Drive
  • 295 mile range (EPA)
  • 155 mph top speed
  • 4.7 seconds 0-60 mph
  • Smart Air Suspension Included

• 75 kWh Battery
  • 237 miles range (EPA)
  • 130 mph top speed
  • 4.9 seconds 0-60 mph
  • Smart Air Suspension Included

FG02.description: Cut through fog and illuminate obstacles on dark roads with LED fog lights that are controlled through the touchscreen. Our newly redesigned fog lights are designed to work with our LED cornering lights and headlights as a complete system.
FG02.name: Exterior Lighting Package

INBPW.description: White seats are stain resistant, easy to clean, and perform best of all seats during high volume test drives. Tesla Recommended.
INBPW.name: White

PX6D.name: Zero to 60 in 2.9 sec

DV4W.override_description:
• Model X P100D is the world’s fastest accelerating production SUV and the safest ever. It comes standard with our best options and upgrades including Ludicrous Speed Upgrade, our best interior, and the Premium Upgrades package.
  • 100 kWh Battery with Performance All-Wheel Drive
  • 289 mile range (EPA)
  • 155 mph top speed
  • 2.9 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 1.4 seconds passing speed, 45-65 mph
DV4W.override_name: The Ultimate Tesla.  Max Performance.  All Premium.

CC04.description:
Maximize passenger and cargo capacity with seating for seven adults. Second and third row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.
CC04.name: Seven Seat Interior

CC02.description:
Passenger capacity and spaciousness are balanced by open access between the second and third row. Third row seats fold flat and flush when not in use creating extra cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.
CC02.name: Six Seat Interior

CC01.description: Comfortably seat five adults in two rows. Second row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.
CC01.name: Five Seat Interior

APF2.description:
This doubles the number of active cameras from four to eight, enabling full self-driving in almost all circumstances, at what we believe will be a probability of safety at least twice as good as the average human driver. The system is designed to be able to conduct short and long distance trips with no action required by the person in the driver’s seat. For Superchargers that have automatic charge connection enabled, you will not even need to plug in your vehicle.

All you will need to do is get in and tell your car where to go. If you don’t say anything, the car will look at your calendar and take you there as the assumed destination or just home if nothing is on the calendar. Your Tesla will figure out the optimal route, navigate urban streets (even without lane markings), manage complex intersections with traffic lights, stop signs and roundabouts, and handle densely packed freeways with cars moving at high speed. When you arrive at your destination, simply step out at the entrance and your car will enter park seek mode, automatically search for a spot and park itself. A tap on your phone summons it back to you.

Please note that Self-Driving functionality is dependent upon extensive software validation and regulatory approval, which may vary widely by jurisdiction. It is not possible to know exactly when each element of the functionality described above will be available, as this is highly dependent on local regulatory approval. Please note also that using a self-driving Tesla for car sharing and ride hailing for friends and family is fine, but doing so for revenue purposes will only be permissible on the Tesla Network, details of which will be released next year.
APF2.name: Full Self-Driving Capability

TRA1.description: Third Row HVAC ~ Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce fringilla ac neque vel bibendum. Morbi ut ante turpis. Quisque consequat, sapien laoreet viverra porttitor, est enim tincidunt tellus, nec pellentesque dui sapien quis turpis. In dignissim magna eget mi euismod elementum.
TRA1.name: Third Row HVAC

CC12.long_name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console
CC12.description:
Add a color matched center console for second row passengers, providing two additional cup holders and a storage cubby under the armrest. The center console is not removable and requires factory installation.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.
CC12.name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console

APPB.description:
Enhanced Autopilot adds new capabilities to the Tesla Autopilot driving experience. The enhancements include going from one to four cameras for greater accuracy, redundancy, and to see fast-approaching vehicles in adjacent lanes. In addition, 12 ultrasonic sonar sensors provide 360 degree coverage around your car with almost twice the range and resolution of the prior version.

The significantly increased sensor information is processed by a computer that is over 40 times more powerful than before. Your Tesla will match speed to traffic conditions, keep within a lane, automatically change lanes without requiring driver input, transition from one freeway to another, exit the freeway when your destination is near, self-park when near a parking spot and be summoned to and from your garage. That said, Enhanced Autopilot should still be considered a driver's assistance feature with the driver responsible for remaining in control of the car at all times.

Tesla’s Enhanced Autopilot software has begun rolling out and features will continue to be introduced as validation is completed, subject to regulatory approval.
APPB.name: Enhanced Autopilot

CW02.description:
Improve cold-weather comfort and convenience by adding:

  • Seat heaters throughout the cabin
  • Heated steering wheel
  • Wiper blade defrosters
CW02.name: Subzero Weather Package

CH04.description: The High Amperage Charger equips Model X with 17.2 kW on onboard charging capabilities, increasing speeds up to 46 miles per hour when used with a Tesla Wall Connector installed on a 90 amp circuit breaker. Recommended for high mileage drivers and those who regularly travel off of the beaten path.
CH04.name: High Amperage Charger

YF01.description: Add elegance to your center console tray with a yacht floor that matches your car's décor. Strips of rubber run lengthwise atop the trim for added grip.
YF01.name: Matching Yacht Floor

FR02.description: Maximize warm weather comfort with ventilated front seats. Cool, dry air circulates through seating perforations to comfortably cool occupants. This upgrade includes perforated seating with accent piping throughout the interior.
FR02.name: Ventilated Front Seats

LP01.description:
Add ambiance to Model X with strategically placed LED lights that illuminate without reflecting off the windshield. Interior lighting includes:
  • Door-panel ambient lights
  • Second-row footwell lights
  • Second-row puddle lights
LP01.name: Premium Interior Lighting

AF02.description: Protect occupants with the medical grade HEPA filter, the largest filter of its kind in any production vehicle. It keeps pollen, bacteria, viruses and pollution from entering the cabin. There are three modes: circulate with outside air, re-circulate inside air and biohazard defense mode that creates positive pressure inside the cabin.
AF02.name: HEPA Filter

SR05.description: Open seating for five with two adults in the second row
SR05.name: Five Seat Interior

SR04.description: Open seating for six with two adults in the second row.
SR04.name: Six Seat Interior

PI01.description:
• Prevent viruses and bacteria from entering the cabin with a medical-grade HEPA air filtration system
    Includes Bioweapon Defense Mode
  • Block offensive odors, nitrogen oxides and hydrocarbon exhaust fumes from polluting cabin air with two activated carbon purification filters
  • Self-presenting front door
  • Custom audio system specifically tuned for a Tesla’s ultra-quiet cabin
  • XM satellite radio capability
  • Sub-zero weather features including heated seats for every passenger, heated steering wheel, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters
PI01.name: Premium Upgrades Package

QLPW.name: White Premium Interior
QLPW.disclaimer: Tesla Recommended, both durable and stain resistant

disclaimer:
Electric Vehicle IncentivesModel X qualifies for a $7,500 federal tax credit and other state sponsored tax incentives and rebates. Visit your state program’s website for information on eligibility and availability. As of March 29, 2016, eligibility for California’s rebate is based on income.
Gasoline SavingsElectric vehicles are less expensive to fuel than gasoline powered vehicles. The average person drives between 10,000 and 15,000 miles and spends between $1,300 and $1,900 on gasoline per year. In comparison, the cost of electricity to power Model X over the same distance is four times lower. Over the five year average length of car ownership, that’s between $4,300 and $6,400 in gasoline savings.

We've assumed a fuel economy of 21 miles per gallon for a comparable gasoline powered sport utility vehicle, for example the 2016 Audi Q7. We’ve also assumed the national average of $0.13 per kilowatt-hour for electricity, 10% charging on Tesla’s Supercharger network and $2.70 per gallon for premium gasoline over the next five years.
CalculatorThe calculator above provides information about the price of the car if you pay in cash and the estimated monthly payment if you participate in Tesla Leasing or Tesla Lending. The calculator does not include taxes or fees, which vary from state to state and in some cases, town to town.
Tesla LeasingAvailable in most states. On approved credit. Not all customers will qualify. Payments do not include applicable taxes. Tax, title, registration and other fees are additional fees that are due at signing. No security deposit required. Estimated monthly payments shown based on lease program that is valid for vehicles delivered by 9/30/17.
Tesla LendingAvailable in all states. On approved credit. Not all customers will qualify. Payments do not include applicable taxes. Tax, title, registration and other fees are additional fees that are due at signing. Estimated monthly payments shown based on the displayed interest rate that is valid for vehicles delivered by 9/30/17.
Interior Storage Volume Includes volume in trunk and rear of second row seats when in cargo mode.
